List certs that the edge proxy will use to cert requests.

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"certs":{"items":{"properties":{"cert":{"description":"PEM-encoded certificate bundle\n\n -----BEGIN EC PARAMETERS-----\n BggqhkjOPQMBBw==\n -----END EC PARAMETERS-----\n -----BEGIN EC PRIVATE KEY-----\n MHcCAQEEIDC3+7pySTQl6WRBuef...\n -----END EC PRIVATE KEY-----\n -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\n MIIBhTCCASugAwIBAgIUQYwE...\n -----END CERTIFICATE-----","type":"string"},"commonName":{"description":"Subject Common Name (typically domain)","type":"string"},"createdAt":{"description":"When cert record was created","type":"string"},"dnsNames":{"description":"Subject Alternative Names (covered domains)","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false},"id":{"description":"Id is the host which this cert is for, e.g., \"example.com\" or \"www.example.com\"","example":"example.com","type":"string"},"isCA":{"description":"Whether cert is a CA (usually false for LE certs)","type":"boolean"},"issuer":{"description":"Certificate issuer name (e.g., Let's Encrypt)","type":"string"},"notAfter":{"description":"Cert validity end time","type":"string"},"notBefore":{"description":"Cert validity start time","type":"string"},"publicKeyAlgorithm":{"description":"Public key algorithm (e.g., RSA, ECDSA)","type":"string"},"publicKeyBitLength":{"description":"Bit length of the public key","type":"integer"},"serialNumber":{"description":"Unique certificate serial number","type":"string"},"signatureAlgorithm":{"description":"Algorithm used to sign the cert (e.g., SHA256-RSA)","type":"string"},"updatedAt":{"description":"When cert record was last updated","type":"string"}},"required":["cert","createdAt","id","updatedAt"],"type":"object","title":"proxy_svc.Cert"},"type":"array","uniqueItems":false}},"type":"object","title":"proxy_svc.ListCertsResponse"}}},"description":"Certs listed successfully"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"proxy_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Invalid JSON"},"401":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"proxy_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Unauthorized"},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"proxy_svc.ErrorResponse"}}},"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
